title: Quantum Break: Steam Edition – v1.0.126.0307
body:
Quantum Break: Steam Edition – v1.0.126.0307


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Cover-based, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Remedy Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 43.5 GB
Repack Size: from 26.3 GB [Selective Download]

Installation is now 2-3 times faster, than in previous repack.

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x.to / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] (MULTI10)
  • RuTor [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • FreeTorrents (ENG/RUS)
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) (MULTi10)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Quantum.Break-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-quantumbreak.iso (46,014,794,066 bytes)
  • Quantum.Break.v1.0.126.0307.Update.REPACK-SKIDROW (556 MB) installed over
  • SKIDROW crack replaced with Voksi-SSE one; SKIDROW crack moved to NoDVD folder, alongside with other alternatives cracks
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of unnecessary languages and videos (1080p and 2160p/4K)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 43.5 to 26.3~31.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~15-20 minutes on SSD; ~30~45 minutes on HDD
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • HDD space after installation: up to 70 GB

You can skip downloading of other language and/or video files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-videos-1080p.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-videos-2160p-4k.bin (download these ONLY if you have a display capable of 4K/2160p)
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-japanese.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-korean.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-tchinese.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and 1080p movies – skip all “selective” files,
but download setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin, setup-fitgirl-selective-videos-1080p.bin & all main files (01-05).

Game Description

Catastrophe becomes your playground after a failed time-machine experiment fractures time itself. As hero Jack Joyce, you’ll fight your way through epic disasters that stutter back and forth in time. But surviving this unstable world—and halting the end of time itself—is only possible by mastering your new time powers.

Push cinematic action to the next level in this time-fractured world. Freeze time to gain the upper hand. Warp past enemies. Turn time-frozen objects into weapons with a single touch. With time itself in your arsenal, combat is never predictable.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is slightly backwards compatible with my previous repack.

setup-fitgirl-selective-videos-1080p.bin and all language files can be rehashed to save you some bandwidth.
